content: Forgot passcode functionality not working I guess there is bug it keep loading and loading also screen just stuck there. Please look into.
replyContent: Hey Kasim! Regret the hassle experience. We're really sorry for the experience. We tried searching for your details but couldn't find any with the username. We request you reach us via live chat in the app or write us at global.escalation@goniyo.com, and we will assist further- AS.

content: Account creation and card delivery was smooth. However while on trip, the app stopped working. I could not increase card limit and I had to use other cards for most of my trip. The support team was not very helpful. It took about 4-5 days for the app to start working after reporting the issues. Many Play Store reviews at that time also complained about servers being down. Overall, very helpful card, if the app works. Just make sure you have backup alternatives.
replyContent: Hi Deepanshu, we're thrilled that you're enjoying using our features! 🙌 This feedback means a lot to us. Especially appreciate the effort you’ve taken to help us improve. Thanks for this, and we’ll be sure to pass on your feedback to our teams and work towards improving the experience for you! - ZG.

content: Is Foreign Atm transactions still dooable?
replyContent: Hey! Our partner bank has been instructed to stop all international transactions on the Global Debit Card until further notice by the RBI. As a result, you will not be able to make international transactions through your Global SBM Debit Card. However, you can opt for Global Credit card which works seamlessly in all international transactions.- SK.
